features: ENHANCED VERSION BUSY BOOKS：Busy Book Learning Toys is Double Thickening Treatment, Strong and Durable, Prevent Small Hand Injury Caused By Too Thin Small Card, Not Easy To Bend, Deformation and Tear.

KIDS FAVORITE DESIGN：We Designed 12 Themes for Toddler Learning Activities Ages 2-4, Including Colors, Letters, Numbers, Rainbow, Shapes, Dinosaur, Vehicle, Weather, Match The Pictures, Cognition of Facial, Vegetables, Fruits, and Planets Etc.

PRESCHOOL ACTIVITY BOOKS：This Busy Book Preschool Learning Toys Helps Create The Link Between Learning and Playing, Allowing Kids To Learn To Understand Thinking, Perceive Colors, and Enhance Logical Knowledge. Contains Knowledge and Content That Children Need To Know The Most.

SECURITY EDUCATIONAL TOY：Our Preschool Activity Binder Use The Highest Quality Safety Materials, A Good Educational Toy for Preschool Teaching Aids, Home Educational Tools, and It Is Also A Parent-child Activities Toys! All Materials Are Safe and Non-toxic.

GREAT TRAVEL TOY CHOICE：Ideal for Long Car Journey & Plane Ride Activities Travel Toys for Toddlers To Keep Your Kid Busy. Toddler Travel Activities, Easy To Carry. Non-hassle Return Within 30 Days. Buy with Confidence.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 4,578 ratings 4.6 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The quality of this book is amazing. Super bright pictures, easy to use, seems sturdy. My toddler is loving it so far.My ONLY complaint is that it turned into an adult workbook too- you have to place all the Velcro on each page individually. It took forever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is colorful and exciting to play with!!!
reviews.reviewText: My daughter received this book today and my 18 month old was already pointing to all of the different, colorful fruits!! The only thing that I was a smidge disappointed with was the Velcro is not attached to the pieces. It is something that an adult has to follow up with. My daughter is getting a laminator for Christmas and plans on laminating all the pieces and then applying the velcro. This is the first baby and she is also a child behaviorist on a baby leave for a couple of years and wants to use this book when she returns to her practice. It is just a great book!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for long car rides or doctor appointments.
reviews.reviewText: I had bought a different busy book for Christmas for my 1yr old son, and it was nice, the quality was ok but the storage bag SUCKS!We are driving 10 hours to Florida soon and my daughter wanted a book too(6 years old) and so I had purchased this one and I truly wish I had also gotten this for my son.The pages are great and the storage bag is amazing’If you’re looking for something to bring along with you (like car rides or appointments) I would highly suggest this one.The only thing I would change is the cards being laminated, I wouldn’t mind paying a little more either; I’m a teacher so I went ahead and laminated mine, but some of them could wear and tear pretty easy if little ones are taking them off rough.But it wasn’t in the description so it isn’t docked off on my review, but literally that’s the only thing I would change.I love it so much and so do my kiddos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Engaging and loved
reviews.reviewText: This is my son’s favorite and it is so easy to bring with us wherever we go! It is entertaining and engaging. Putting the dots on takes a long time and careful fingers so that’s a challenge with initial set up and although it has a sturdy lamination and the book binding seems durable, my two year old already bent many of the longer pieces permanently. Book has lots of pages with different vocabulary and topics and is a favorite item for him and I love that it is more academic focused and not requiring batteries. We do it together and sometimes he does it alone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great to keep your child busy
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product that teaches your children many different things. My daughter loves it and keeps her busy and away from screen time. Comes with a nice bag and ouches to hold every piece.My only complaint is that you have to add the Velcro patches to each item and there’s a lot. Wish it already came assembled.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great learning tool
reviews.reviewText: There are a pages that are suited for kids as they get older. I don’t care for the page with face features.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for kids learning and to keep busy
reviews.reviewText: Bought as a gift for 2 -3 year old. The parent of the child love this and apparently had sobering similar on their wishlist without me knowing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but requires assembly!
reviews.reviewText: When I bought this, I didn't realize it requires assembly. The velcro bits need to be attached to both the book and the pieces. Other than that, it seems like a good find. I just got it put together so we will see how it stands up to my little.
My kids absolutely love it .. so easy to learn and very creative

Purchased this busy book in February 2023, my 3 year old still enjoys it. An activity straight from unboxing, I myself enjoyed assembling it together with my child. Very bright, colourful and basic subjects for her to learn from. Only down fall about the product is that over time, the cards do fold if left unsupervised (general wear and tear by child) overall it is a great product for kids.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buyer Beware - Poor Quality, Bad Grammar
reviews.reviewText: For the high price point of this book, the quality is shocking. You have to apply velcro yourself, which means that the images aren't centred when they're applied unless you have perfect attention to detail.More importantly, as it's a book to help children read and write, there are spelling mistakes ("Stegosaur") and grammar mistakes, (Inconsistent capitalisation and missing articles, "Match Planet", "Blueberry/Ice cream/kite" as titles.) The product description and insert are both in very poorly written English, "toy's for kids," and one of the activities is just a list of numbers, 1-100, with no pictures or anything. That's it. Just a list.There are some beautiful busy books online, this is just cheap, mass-produced, poor image quality junk. Very disappointed and lodged a return.
